entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Edson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edson Airport 9:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -8.3°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Wind Chill: -10
Wind: SSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
